articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Ryongaksan Soap Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Ryongaksan Soap Factory
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the newly built Ryongaksan Soap Factory.
					 Enjoying a panoramic view of the factory with a broad smile on his face, he said with great satisfaction that a large-scale modern factory was built in a matter of a few months though it seemed like yesterday when he was visiting the construction site. Another factory has sprung up to contribute to improving the standard of the people's living, he added. 
					
					 He went round various places of the factory to learn in detail about the production processes, technical specifications of equipment and varieties and quality of products.
					
					 Appreciating the successful construction of the factory, he said he was pleased with everything there as the building area and production space have been built and equipment are rationally distributed on the basis of the scientific design of technological processes and the inside and outside of the factory have been arranged in an impeccable style.
					
					 He noted that all production processes have been put on an automated and unmanned basis at a high level and an excellent integrated production system established in line with the features of the factory producing all kinds of liquid soap and detergent.
					
					 He was pleased that the factory has not only modern injection moulding machines capable of easily producing various containers for liquid soap which look nice and convenient but sufficient cutting-edge equipment capable of analyzing and examining the quality and hygienic safety of products.
					
					 He said that it is gratifying to see varieties of products including shampoo, rinse, detergent for vessels and soap powder on high pile, though the factory started production not long before.
					
					 He set forth the tasks facing the factory including the issues of increasing varieties of liquid soap and detergent and their output year by year and thoroughly guaranteeing their quality and further improving their trademarks.
					
					 Noting that the factory was successfully built in such a manner as to match the natural scenery of Mt. Ryongak, he recalled that leader Kim Jong Il gave instructions to build a factory specializing in the production of liquid soap on several occasions in his lifetime and said with pleasure that one of his behests was fulfilled.
					
					 He said with a broad smile on his face that he was pleased to picture the people liking varieties of liquid soap and detergent produced by the factory, adding he was relieved of the pent-up fatigue.
					
					 The Ryongaksan Soap Factory is a factory to which the Party pays great attention and a factory directly related to improving the people's standard of living, he said, expressing expectation and conviction that its officials and employees would creditably fulfill their honorable duty.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Kim Yong Su, So Hong Chan, Jo Yong Won and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Turkey
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Turkey
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Recep Tayyip Erdogan, president of the Republic of Turkey, on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would further develop in conformity with the aspiration and desire of the peoples of the two countries and wished him success in the work for prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Farms in South Phyongan Province
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Farms in South Phyongan Province
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju inspected farms in South Phyongan Province to observe provincial farming situation.
					 Agricultural workers of Taedong, Sukchon and Mundok Counties increased agricultural production by putting great efforts into farming from the outset of the year.
					
					 The premier encouraged the farmers taking the lead in implementing the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on agricultural revolution in various co-op farms busy with fall harvest and threshing.
					
					 He underlined the need to successfully complete the harvest essential for rounding off the 200-day campaign and for relevant units to satisfactorily supply farming machines and their parts.
					
					 He also visited the Natural Energy Institute of the State Academy of Sciences and the 13th national sci-tech presentation and exhibition in the field of nano technology.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Delegation Stresses Need to Contribute to Struggle of Progressive Humankind
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Delegation Stresses Need to Contribute to Struggle of Progressive Humankind
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Ri Jong Hyok, director of the National Reunification Institute who is heading a delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a speech at the plenary meeting of the 135th General Assembly of the Inter-Parliamentary Union held in Geneva, Switzerland on Oct. 25.
					 He said:
					
					 Defending human rights is one of the most sensitive and important issues for all countries and nations. Resolutions on ensuring human rights were adopted on the international arena including the UN and the Inter-Parliamentary Union, but human rights abuses and disasters have been reported nonstop in all parts of the world, and confrontation and disputes between nations and civilizations escalated, posing serious threat to global peace and security and the right to existence of mankind. 
					
					 This taught us the lesson that there could be no human rights apart from sovereignty under the serious human rights situation in different counties whose sovereignty were infringed upon owing to the aggression, interference in internal affairs and unilateral sanctions by the U.S. and other big powers.
					
					 The unprecedented political and economic sanctions imposed by the U.S. on the DPRK are human rights crimes tantamount to mass destruction as they deny and obliterate the right to existence of the whole nation.
					
					 The DPRK is the socialist state centered on the popular masses and it is guided by the Juche idea which puts forward human being as the most precious existence. The DPRK is the people-first society where all the people enjoy the genuine political, economic and cultural rights.
					
					 At a time when the U.S. deployed huge armed forces on the Korean peninsula with the sinister aim to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, the heroic service personnel of the Korean People's Army are conducting a campaign for harnessing the nature to defend the people's happiness in the northern part of the country which suffered from huge natural disaster, true to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea which regards it as the most important revolutionary work to relieve the people of their misfortune.
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces regarding the hostility toward the DPRK as their state policy are resorting to the vicious economic sanctions and smear "human rights" campaign, finding it impossible to bring down the DPRK by force. 
					
					 The U.S. checked the introduction of sports apparatuses which have nothing to do with military purposes and refused the remittance to bank for the settlement of accounts of the DPRK's membership fee to the Secretariat of the IPU.
					
					 But no sanctions, blockade and fabrication can ever work on the Korean people nor can they tarnish the image of the DPRK invariably advancing along the road for the improvement of genuine human rights.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever make contribution to the struggle of progressive mankind for defending global peace, security and human rights, and fulfill its mission and responsibility before the international community.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for India
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for India
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Emergency Disaster Committee led by Chairman Kang Il Sop left here Saturday to take part in the Asian ministerial meeting on reduction of the danger of disaster to be held in New Delhi.

articles.title: Japanese Buddhist Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Buddhist Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A Japanese Buddhist delegation with Raitei Arima, director general of the Kyoto Buddhist Society of Japan, as its honorary leader and Imei Miyamoto, representation officer of Head Temple, Shohin-ji, as its leader, arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A Japanese Buddhist delegation and other foreign guests visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Centenarian in Huichon Receives Birthday Spread
articles.content:
Centenarian in Huichon Receives Birthday Spread
 Huichon, October 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Kim Sung Ok, a woman centenarian residing in neighborhood unit No. 8 in Songji-ri, Huichon City, Jagang Province.
					 She was born as a daughter of poor farmer in Puhung-ri, Huichon City, Jagang Province. She lived in grief as a member of a stateless nation, subject to maltreatment and contempt. It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she could lead a worthy life.
					
					 She worked hard as an agricultural worker to live up even a bit to the benevolence shown by the Party and the leader who put forward farmers as landowner.
					
					 She brought up six sons and daughters to send them to country-defending posts and difficult fields, and help them fulfill their duties.
					
					 She has a balanced diet while keeping herself optimistic.

articles.title: Educational Aid Materials Supplied to Disaster Areas
articles.content:
Educational Aid Materials Supplied to Disaster Areas
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Kangwon Province of the DPRK has supplied 17,190 pieces of educational equipment and materials of 90 kinds to the flood-hit northern part of the country, cherishing the Workers' Party of Korea's warm love for posterity.
					 The Kangwon Provincial People's Committee and the Provincial Foreign Trade Administration Bureau provided projectors, video recorders and many other educational equipment and materials.
					
					 The Wonsan Furniture Factory finished the production of more than 600 teaching tools, including teacher's desks and blackboards ahead of schedule.

articles.title: DPRK Women Footballers Win Prizes in World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Women Footballers Win Prizes in World Cup
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team emerged winner in the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup recently held in Jordan.
					 And its three footballers, Ri Hae Yon, Sung Hyang Sim and Ri Kum Hyang, won such prizes as Silver Boot, Best Player and Silver Ball.
					
					 During the world cup, Ri Hae Yon, a forward, scored six goals in total to win Silver Boot. She contributed to beating the Japanese rival in the finals of the 2015 AFC U-16 Women's Championship by shooting a decisive goal.
					
					 Sung Hyang Sim earned three prizes of Best Player and a Silver Ball.
					
					 Ri Kum Hyang, a full back, was awarded the prize of Best Player for her responsible and skillful role in the quarterfinals with the Ghanaian team.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses Obama Group of Invective Hurting Dignity of DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses Obama Group of Invective Hurting Dignity of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Obama group before retirement are expending their last efforts in their campaign to hurt the dignity of the DPRK.
					 Warlike boss Obama at the UN General Assembly cried out for forcing the DPRK to pay a "high price." The U.S. secretary of State and the assistant secretary of State called the dignified DPRK "illegal and illegitimate regime".
					
					 Evil words spit by the ignorant Obama group obsessed with ill-intended inveterate repugnancy toward the DPRK are very hackneyed ones mouthed by them as chronic ill during the whole period of their term.
					
					 Great irony is the poor image of the Obama group grumbling about the DPRK just before retirement as people say that habit is a second nature.
					
					 A string of invective let out by the Obama group is nothing but gibberish talked by those who are more dead than alive as they are in a miserable position to leave its failed policy towards the DPRK to the next administration, after suffering bitter setbacks in the political and military standoff with it.
					
					 As its hostile policy toward the DPRK proved to be a total failure, the Obama administration has no alternative but to leave the issue of "its legacy" called "DPRK capable of mounting a nuclear attack on the U.S. mainland" to be settled by the next administration. 
					
					 Obama has persisted in nuclear blackmail and military threat and unprecedented sanctions against the DPRK, with the wild ambition for stifling it. This only pushed the DPRK to nuclear weaponization at a high level and emergence of a full-fledged nuclear power with the strongest nuclear strike capability.
					
					 After all, the reckless remarks made by the Obama group from the beginning of his term ended up admitting and hyping its heavy defeat.
					
					 "Due punishment" of someone much touted by Obama since he took power is now directed to the U.S. mainland. It has forced the DPRK to make a "cool option", but the latter is now dictating the former to choose between rolling back its hostile policy toward the latter and going to ruin.
					
					 Even American politicians sharply criticize almost every day the Obama administration, saying that its policy for invading the DPRK called "strategic patience" has gone totally bust as it pushed the DPRK to "strengthening its system" and "taking nuclear weapons".
					
					 It is the nature of a silly dog to bark at the jaw of death.
					
					 The more malignantly the Obama group lets out invective to save its face under the eyes of the world, the more saliently it will reveal the wretched and pitiable plight of the loser.
					
					 The Obama group would be well advised to behave with prudence and self-control and pack and leave the White House earlier in order not to suffer bitterer shame and setback. 
					
					 The American politicians had better draw a lesson from the policy failures of the Obama administration.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits out at Park Geun Hye Group's Smear Campaign against DPRK in International Arena
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits out at Park Geun Hye Group's Smear Campaign against DPRK in International Arena
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors are busy with confrontation with the compatriots in the north even in the international arena only to draw a torrent of criticism and curse.
					 A south Korean puppet delegate attending the recent meeting of the 4th Committee of the 71st UN General Assembly spouted a string of rubbish against the DPRK, asserting the international community is making efforts for peaceful use of space but the north is an exception and the real aim of the north's satellite launch is obviously not to meet a peaceful purpose.
					
					 His behavior was so nonsensical and rude that all participants in the meeting criticized and cursed him.
					
					 Such disgusting behavior of the south Korean delegate which disturbed the conference hall out of his inveterate repugnancy, persecution mania and the bad habit of making profound confusing of right and wrong is just little short of a hysteric fit of those stunned by the invincible might of the ever-victorious DPRK.
					
					 Putting satellites into space is the legitimate right of a sovereign state and an exercise of sovereignty that conforms to the outer space treaty specifying the peaceful use of outer space as a right of all countries.
					
					 Pursuant to its 5-year plan for national space development, the DPRK has launched a variety of application satellites urgently needed for its sci-tech and economic development in strict compliance with the UN Charter, outer space treaty and other international law.
					
					 U.S. and other satellite launchers have never launched their satellites with an approval of someone and there has been no claim that a satellite launched by a country is not a satellite.
					
					 The DPRK formally registered its earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 in the UN through legal procedures and this was also recognized by the world public.
					
					 Whoever finds fault with the satellite put by the DPRK into an orbit in outer space with its own efforts and technology is little short of making unpardonable mockery and insult to the inviolable dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 Such groundless claim that all satellites launches of the DPRK should be termed "illegal" as the "north is an exception" betrays the hysteric fit of the Park group of traitors keen on escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 It was none other than traitor Park who took the lead in calling for a "security meeting" and termed satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 a long-range ballistic missile launch when the satellite soared into space.
					
					 Park, who lacks the ability to distinguish a satellite from long-range ballistic missile, didn't forget to snipe at the compatriots in her more than 500 public appearances in recent years.
					
					 Not content with crying out for hurting the compatriots and escalating confrontation with them and soliciting cooperation in pressurizing them during her dozens of foreign junkets after taking office, she is now pushing her minions to orchestrate such poor farces as above-said hooliganism at an international meeting.
					
					 She terms satellite launch for peaceful purposes "threat" and the deployment of THAAD, a source of trouble, "something for the benefit of the people." This is shame on the nation.
					
					 No wonder, even south Korean media are commenting that her group are a "pack of guys with a twisted conception of hating even trees and woods in the north."
					
					 It is by no means accidental that Park and her group often face cool reception at international meetings.
					
					 The Park group's desperate smear campaign against the DPRK will only bring to light their wretched position and invite worldwide derision.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Warned Not to Run Amuck under Eyes of KPA
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Warned Not to Run Amuck under Eyes of KPA
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army (KPA) has already declared its stand that it would never pardon all forms of "psychological warfare against the north" in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL), regarding them as military provocations against it.
					 Despite this warning, the south Korean puppet warmongers have been setting up a new large electronic display 10 meters high and 18 meters wide near the Igilri post in Cholwon County, south Korean Kangwon Province, in the demilitarized zone along the MDL since Oct. 27.
					
					 One can interpret that the project is pursuant to the public announcement made by the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense that it would increase the number of louder speakers and the time of broadcasting and the number of visual psychological warfare equipment through the building of new electronic displays, etc. in a bid to intensify the "psychological warfare against the north"
					
					 The puppet forces made no scruple of blustering that they would set up and operate "downtown style" movable and immovable displays showing even animation files unlike those showing letters only in the past, claiming that "electronic displays are much more effective in psychological warfare than louder speaker broadcasting." This means they have buckled down to carrying out the first phase of the project.
					
					 The puppet forces' decision to set up new electronic display for "psychological warfare against the north" was prompted by their cynical ploy to drive the extreme confrontation with compatriots to a direct military conflict.
					
					 They must be aware that the KPA defending their leader and social system with arms would not overlook the vicious anti-DPRK confrontation hysteria taking place under its eyes.
					
					 They are seeking to set up the above-said display as a target of strike, lead the KPA to take counteraction and justify their military provocation under this pretext.
					
					 Their reckless anti-DPRK psychological warfare is pushing the tense situation in the areas along the MDL to an unpredictable phase.
					
					 They tried to provoke the DPRK through all base moves such as setting up louder speakers and letting out a flurry of invective in the frontline areas. Finding all of them unworkable, they are going to use even electronic displays as means for confrontation with compatriots but they will be made to pay a dear price for such reckless act.
					
					 They are expecting anything to happen after the futile erection of such electronic display but they will only face merciless retaliatory counteractions including the direct sighting strike of the KPA. 
					
					 The hatred of the KPA against the confrontation maniacs and its resolution to retaliate against them are running high.
					
					 The puppet military warmongers had better stop acting rashly under the eyes of the KPA, unaware of their death.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Hoguk Drill
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Hoguk Drill
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet joint chiefs of staff announced they would stage Hoguk drill from Oct. 31 to Nov. 11, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The drill in which the three services are involved envisages an enforcement of operation plan of the frontline corps, a drill of two-way drill of motorized infantry division, joint naval drill, landing and other attack drills.
					
					 It was reported that the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces will be involved in some of them.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Disqualified as "President": S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Disqualified as "President": S. Korean Paper
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on Oct. 27 in an editorial accused Park Geun Hye of limiting the time and scope of advices she received from Choe Sun Sil in her "apology to people" on Oct. 25. 
					 The editorial continued:  
					
					 Everything she uttered turned out to be a lie in a few hours later. Testimonies were made here and there that even recently Choe Sun Sil interfered in all aspects of administration including diplomacy, security and personnel affair. It is confusing to see the "president" who talked a lie while making an apology with tears in her eyes.
					
					 We can no longer believe words of Park Geun Hye. She lost confidence.
					
					 This means she is disqualified as "president".

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams Park Geun Hye's Charade to Deceive People
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams Park Geun Hye's Charade to Deceive People
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People carried an editorial on Oct. 28.
					 According to the result of opinion poll on Oct. 26, it said that most of respondents urged Park Geun Hye to step down from office of her own accord and that the "National Assembly" should promote impeachment. Those who expressed disappointment and indignation at Park's "apology to the people" went beyond 80 percent, it said.
					
					 The apology is no more than a charade to deceive the people, it noted.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Foolish Understanding of Economy
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Foolish Understanding of Economy
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on Oct. 25 in an editorial chided the policy speech on the draft budget for 2017 made by Park Geun Hye at the "National Assembly" on Oct. 24.
					 The editorial said: 
					
					 Park Geun Hye praised the "government" policy and "successes" and claimed that it failed to achieve economic growth because there was no continuity of policies due to "single-term presidency."
					
					 Park's words praising the "policy for "cultural prosperity" which led to "Choe Sun Sil gate" make people think she is living in other country.

articles.title: Sordid Relations between Park Geun Hye and Heavyweights Responsible for State Affairs Monopolization Disclosed
articles.content:
Sordid Relations between Park Geun Hye and Heavyweights Responsible for State Affairs Monopolization Disclosed
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean KBS on Oct. 25 disclosed the relations between Park Geun Hye and heavyweights who monopolized state affairs.
					 It said:
					
					 Choe Sun Sil is a daughter of Choe Thae Min, who was once advisor to Park Geun Hye, had intimate relations with Park from 37 years ago.
					
					 Jong Yun Hoe, former husband of Choe Sun Sil, served as advisor to Park Geun Hye after getting married with Choe and was called confidant and this sparked off the case of backstage heavyweights in 2014.
					
					 That is why people said Choe Sun Sil was first, Jong Yun Hoe second and Park Geun Hye third in the ranking of power of south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays in October Marked in Brazil
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays in October Marked in Brazil
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting at the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil and a seminar at Pernambuco Federal National University from Sep. 28 to Oct. 21 on the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 71st anniversary of the WPK and the 90th anniversary of Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, noted that the DIU formed by President Kim Il Sung is the historic roots of the WPK and under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un the WPK and the Korean people are advancing triumphantly, foiling the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces to strangle the DPRK.
					
					 Aleksandr Neves Rosendo da Silva, secretary general of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other speakers praised Kim Il Sung's ideological and theoretical exploits and the feats he performed in building the party, country and army and Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary exploits.
					
					 They lauded Kim Jong Un for wisely leading the Korean people in their struggle for beefing up the defense capability and protecting socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary to Be Remembered in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary to Be Remembered in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The remembrance committee of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria for the 5th anniversary of demise of HE Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Abuja on Tuesday.
					 Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria and co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events such as a seminar, film show and remembrance meeting praising the revolutionary life and exploits of Kim Jong Il and introducing the struggle of the Korean people vigorously accelerating the construction of a socialist power under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary to Be Remembered in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary to Be Remembered in Benin
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Benin national committee for remembering General Kim Jong Il was formed in Cotonou on October 25.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The remembrance committee decided to actively organize events praising Kim Jong Il's devotional life on the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la Fabrica de Jabones Ryongaksan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la Fabrica de Jabones Ryongaksan
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la recien construida Fabrica de Jabones Ryongaksan.
					Contemplando sonriente el panorama de la fabrica, el dijo muy satisfecho que a unos meses desde su anterior visita al campo de construccion, se ha edificado esta planta grande y moderna como otra base que contribuira al mejoramiento de las condiciones de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos, se cercioro en detalles de las especificaciones tecnicas de los procesos de produccion y equipos y de las variedades y calidad de los productos.
					
					Volviendo a evaluar la construccion magnifica de la fabrica, expreso que le gustan todas las cosas como la formacion del area arquitectonica y espacio de produccion a base del cientifico diseno de procesos tecnicos, la ubicacion racional de equipos y el acondicionamiento perfecto del interior y exterior de la fabrica.
					
					Prosiguio que todos los procesos de produccion estan automatizados en alto nivel y la fabrica establecio el excelente sistema de produccion integral conveniente a su caracteristica de base productiva de jabones liquidos y detergentes de diversos tipos.
					
					Se mostro contento de que se hayan instalado las modernas maquinas de modelado por inyeccion capaces de fabricar en gran cantidad los vistosos y comodos recipientes de jabon liquido y los ultramodernos equipos que analizan y comprueban la calidad y seguridad higienica de los productos.
					
					La produccion comenzo hace poco, pero ya se ven los montones de champu, acondicionador, detergente de platos, jabon en polvo y otros productos, dijo complacido.
					
					Presento las tareas que incumben a la fabrica como aumentar cada ano las variedades y la produccion de jabon liquido y detergentes, garantizar su calidad, mejorar las marcas de productos, etc.
					
					La Fabrica de Jabones Ryongaksan fue construida magnificamente en armonia con el paisaje natural del monte Ryongak, reitero.
					
					Al recordar que en su vida, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il habia dado en varias ocasiones las instrucciones de construir una fabrica especializada en la produccion de jabon liquido, apunto en tono muy alegre que se ha cumplido otro de los legados del Dirigente.
					
					Me alivio de las fatigas acumuladas al imaginar a las habitantes que se alegrarian cuando reciban varios jabones liquidos y detergentes hechos en esta fabrica, dijo.
					
					Subrayando que el PTC presta profunda atencion a la fabrica porque ella esta relacionada directamente con el mejoramiento de la vida poblacional, expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica cumpliran bien su tarea honrosa.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Kim Yong Su, So Hong Chan, Jo Yong Won y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita Dia Nacional de Turquia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita Dia Nacional de Turquia
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 29 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Turquia, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, con motivo del Dia Nacional de este pais.
					Convencido de que las relaciones entre los dos paises se desarrollaran aun mas conforme a la aspiracion y deseo de los dos pueblos, el remitente deseo al destinatario exitos en sus trabajos para la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Premier coreano visita las granjas de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur
articles.content:
Premier coreano visita las granjas de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno la situacion de agricultura en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					Los campesinos de los distritos de Taedong, Sukchon y Mundok lograron muchos exitos al concentrar las fuerzas en las faenas agricolas desde los principios de este ano.
					
					En su recorrido por las granjas cooperativas enfrascadas en la cosecha y la trilladura, estimulo a los trabajadores agricolas que materializaran en la delantera la linea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre la revolucion agricola y averiguo en detalles las perspectivas de rendimiento y estado de cosecha de las plantaciones.
					
					Asigno las tareas para que los funcionarios y los trabajadores de la rama agricola cosechen sin perdidas todos los cereales cultivados a lo largo de primavera y verano para concluir asi con victoria la campana de 200 dias y que las unidades vinculadas suministren suficientes maquinas agricolas y sus accesorios, etc.
					
					Con anterioridad, Pak Pong Ju recorrio el Instituto de Energias Naturales de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias y la sede de la XIII Presentacion-Exhibicion Nacional de Nanotecnologia.
					
					En esas visitas resalto la necesidad de mejorar el papel de los cientificos y tecnicos en abrir la via de cumplimiento de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de economia nacional.

articles.title: ACNC califica de alaridos agonicos las calumnias anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC califica de alaridos agonicos las calumnias anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los compinches de Obama, que esta a punto de terminar su mandato, recrudecen la difamacion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					El caudillo de guerra, Obama, dijo en la Asamblea General de la ONU que la RPDC "debe pagar el precio severo", mientras el secretario de Estado y el asistente del secretario de Estado de EE.UU. soltaron los disparates ofensivos calificando el prestigioso poder de la RPDC como "el ilegal e ilegitimo". 
					
					Las persistentes calumnias anti-RPDC de la banda de Obama parten de la ignorancia y veto al pais socialista. 
					
					Es muy ridicula la situacion de Obama que sufrio la derrota amarga en la confrontacion politica y militar con la RPDC y debe retirarse del poder sin remedio alguno. 
					
					El chantaje nuclear, la amenaza militar y la campana de sancion inauditos empujaron a la RPDC a convertirse en la digna potencia nuclear con invencible capacidad de golpe nuclear. 
					
					Pues, los disparates anti-RPDC, que solto la banda de Obama desde primeros dias de su mandato, no trajeron otro resultado que reconocer la derrota del imperio americano. 
					
					El "castigo merecido" a alguien, de que hablaba tanto Obama, lo recibe ahora el imperio americano. Y la "opcion serena", que Obama pretendia imponer a la RPDC, llevo a EE.UU. al dilema de renunciar la politica hostil a la RPDC o sufrir el arruinamiento. 
					
					Ahora dentro del circulo politico estadounidense salen las criticas de que la politica de agresion a la RPDC de la administracion Obama, reconocida como "paciencia estrategica", es la "totalmente fracasada" que empujo al "Norte de Corea a fortalecer su regimen y contar con armas nucleares". 
					
					Las calumnias anti-RPDC destinadas a recuperar su deshonra revelan mas la situacion miserable del derrotado. 
					
					La banda de Obama debe retirarse temprano de la Casa Blanca. Y los politicos estadounidenses deben sacar la leccion de la derrota del poder de Obama.
